parameters.prompt: dream pop, melancholic, nostalgic, synthesizer, reverb-drenched, whispered vocals, lo-fi beats
parameters.lyrics: [verse] The streetlights hum a lullaby / Through the fog of June nights / Your shadow lingers on the wall / A silhouette I still recall [chorus] We were porcelain, we were glass / Fragile things that couldn’t last / Now the cracks show where we broke / Echoes fade with every note [verse] The radio plays our old refrain / Static love, a dying flame / You left your scent on every page / A story lost, a folded stage [chorus] We were porcelain, we were glass / Fragile things that couldn’t last / Now the cracks show where we broke / Echoes fade with every note [bridge] Maybe time will blur the edges / Maybe rain will wash the ledges / But the ghost of you remains / In the quiet, in the frames [outro] The streetlights dim to ember glow / The night exhales, I let you go
